projects.name: MultiSig Wallet
projects.description: A multi-signature wallet application built with Thirdweb and Vite. Features secure multi-sig functionality with user-friendly onboarding using ConnectButton.
projects.tech_stack: TypeScript, Solidity, Vite, Thirdweb, Tailwind CSS

projects.name: HealthTrove
projects.description: Decentralized healthcare management system on Base Network. Features appointment scheduling, secure healthcare record management using IPFS, role-based access control, and doctor content monetization platform.
projects.tech_stack: React, Vite, Solidity, IPFS, Wagmi, Viem, Pinata, Base Network

projects.name: iFindr
projects.description: A Next.js web application with TypeScript focused on discovery and search functionality. Modern web application with optimized font loading and hot reloading.

projects.name: EducationChain (Decentralized School Tree)
projects.description: Ethereum-based platform for educational institutions to manage student enrollment, attendance, and program administration with transparent financial tracking. Features NFT certificates, revenue sharing, and role-based access control.

projects.name: DEX dApp Template
projects.description: Starter template for building decentralized exchange applications using Next.js and thirdweb SDK. Provides quick setup for blockchain-based trading platforms.
projects.tech_stack: Next.js, TypeScript, thirdweb SDK, Tailwind CSS

projects.name: CaveFi
projects.description: Transform any group chat into a sophisticated investment fund. Friends pool money through messages, vote on investments via reactions, and get automated portfolio managementâ€”all without leaving their chat.

projects.name: DX Bloom
projects.description: A decentralized content monetization platform where creators publish premium content and charge USDC for pay-per-view or subscriptions, with automatic royalty distribution.
projects.tech_stack: Solidity, Next.js, TypeScript, Foundry, OnchainKit, Base

projects.name: OneSeed
projects.description: Personal savings protocol built on Uniswap V4 that automatically saves a portion of every token swap. Features configurable savings percentage, automated vault tracking, and gas-optimized contracts using custom hooks.
projects.tech_stack: Uniswap V4, Solidity, Next.js 15, Biconomy, ERC6909

projects.name: Bridge Scope
projects.description: Web application built with Next.js and TypeScript, featuring Prisma database integration. Focus on cross-chain bridge monitoring and analytics.

projects.name: PaySteam
projects.description: Smart contract platform for streaming payments. Enables continuous, programmable payment flows for various use cases.
